definitions.definition: the surface in a that can be heated to very high temperatures and under which you put food to be cooked
a frame of metal bars over a fire on which food can be put to be cooked
an informal restaurant that sells grilled food such as hamburgers, steak, and chicken
to cook food over fire or hot coals, usually on a metal frame:
examples: Dad was grilling chicken in the back yard.

definitions.definition: to cook something under a very hot surface in a :
examples: I'll grill the bacon rather than fry it.
